Prince of Saxony.  In the translation of the chorus the editor has
changed the second line to give it a general application rather than a
specific reference to the monarch.

MOFFATT,W G         
Z0067

                              (THOU WILT KEEP HIM IN PERFECT PEACE     T
   C 
080204
      
      
      
      
      
      
      
      
      
      
      
      
      
      
      
Composed by the great-uncle of Robert Moffatt, the current Knox piano
technician. William Moffatt was a music teacher and music consultant
to schools in the Crow's Nest Pass district.  He occasionally attended
Knox around the time the present building was constructed.
